mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_order ( uid, recv_name, recv_phone, recv_address, total_price, status, create_time, pay_time, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{uid}, #{recvName}, #{recvPhone}, #{recvAddress}, #{totalPrice}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{payTime}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )

INSERT INTO t_order_item ( order_id, goods_id, goods_image, goods_title, goods_price, goods_num, created_user, created_time, modified_user, modified_time ) VALUES ( #{orderId}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsImage}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsPrice}, #{goodsNum}, #{createdUser}, #{createdTime}, #{modifiedUser}, #{modifiedTime} )
mapper.select: select o.id, o.recv_name, o.recv_phone, oi.goods_title form t_order as o inner_join t_order_item as oi on o.id = oi.oeder_id
